metadata.synopsis: An Ardent shows up after the infirmary ambush and sends the player to talk to the captain. This is to communicate to the player that they may continue exploring the Creche.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up cre_main_Ago to 1285; -2; -801talk to the doctor asking to use the zaithiskbreak the zaithisk by completing the dialoggo out of the room and fight the ambushing giththe ardent will show up to say this line.

0.speaker: 62add678-f00a-4603-8938-06ad25c03d18
0.text: This mess - this is your doing? Impressive. Our Captain may have use for you - report to her immediately.

1.speaker: 62add678-f00a-4603-8938-06ad25c03d18
1.text: I am not in the habit of asking twice, istik. The Captain, now.
